verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:17
verses.text: Then said Saul unto the people that were with him, Number now, and see who is gone from us. And when they had numbered, behold, Jonathan and his armourbearer were not there.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:18
verses.text: And Saul said unto Ahiah, Bring hither the ark of God. For the ark of God was at that time with the children of Israel.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:19
verses.text: And it came to pass, while Saul talked unto the priest, that the noise that was in the host of the Philistines went on and increased: and Saul said unto the priest, Withdraw thine hand.
